name: Exodius
description:
Future Survival/RPG game, still in developement.

Features :

-Start Menu with options and different resolutions configurations

-Move and Jump on a basic test map

-Acess to a pause menu by pressing "P" with some fonctions

-Particules of fire

-Sprint, and stamina bar

-A first test (ugly) IA wich follow you when it see you and after walk in the map randomly

-Items you can pick up are highlited when you look at them, and you can pick them up by pressing "E"

-VR supported (Maybe, we still testing it)

-Life bar

-Breaking trees Etc,

- + Watch developement log

/!\ I know there are bugs in game, it's just the very first prototype, like there is a problem with your 3D model, and the "respawn" button don't work really well. I also know that everything in this game is ugly, but for the moment it is really a prototype and i decided to focus on mechanical part of the game for the moment, but update will come soon and frequently :) /!\

Future features in developement :

-We want this game to be a Survival/RPG with strange creatures and a lot of nature and different space and time locations, and a lot of magic, but not too much humans.

-Procedural generated world (maybe but very far)

-New map ( less ugly )

-Inventory system ( in dev )

-Building system

-Quests systems

-Pnjs and mobs

-Attacks ( in dev )

-And many other things

If you have any questions or suggestions you can ask it in comment, we are opened to everything

(I know the file name is "Exoworld" and not "Exodius" but don't worry, it's just because we changed the name recently, updates are coming soon)
